description:
The Open Source Alternative To Notion.

AppFlowy is an open source alternative to Notion.
You are in charge of your data and customizations.
Version 0.10.0 â€“ 29/09/2025
Desktop
New Features
- Person, a new database property, lets you assign a row to one or more collaborators
Mobile
New Features
- Person, a new database property, lets you assign a row to one or more collaborators
- iOS Share to AppFlowy: quickly save browser page links with optional notes to a target AppFlowy database
- Android Share to AppFlowy: quickly save browser page links with optional notes to a target AppFlowy page and database
- A new Android widget: Quick Page Access
